description: This file defines the IUserSettings interface within the WPEFramework's Exchange namespace. It declares methods for managing and notifying changes to user settings such as audio descriptions, language preferences, captions, and privacy modes, as well as registering notification callbacks.

classes.name: IUserSettings
classes.description: An interface for managing user settings related to media presentation and privacy preferences within the WPEFramework platform.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Registers a notification callback for user setting changes.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Unregisters a previously registered notification callback.

methods.name: SetAudioDescription
methods.description: Enables or disables audio description feature.

methods.name: GetAudioDescription
methods.description: Retrieves the current state of the audio description setting.

methods.name: SetPreferredAudioLanguages
methods.description: Sets the preferred list of audio languages.

methods.name: GetPreferredAudioLanguages
methods.description: Gets the current preferred audio languages.

methods.name: GetCaptions
methods.description: Retrieves the current captions enable/disable state.

methods.name: SetPreferredCaptionsLanguages
methods.description: Sets the preferred list of caption languages.

methods.name: GetPreferredCaptionsLanguages
methods.description: Gets the current preferred captions languages.

methods.name: SetPreferredClosedCaptionService
methods.description: Sets the preferred closed caption service.

methods.name: GetPreferredClosedCaptionService
methods.description: Gets the current preferred closed caption service.

methods.name: SetPrivacyMode
methods.description: Sets the privacy mode (share or do not share).

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Registers a notification callback for user setting changes.

ctags.name: INotification
ctags.pattern: /^  struct EXTERNAL INotification : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
